title: Rick Rubin: Vibe Coding is the Punk Rock of Software

rawLines.text: So many people I know who use AI ask it
questions and think that the results
that they get back is the answer. And it
seems like people are more interested in
getting an answer that can allow them to
stop thinking about the question than
really finding out what the real answer
is. I'm so interested in what AI really
can know based on what is and not what
we tell it we think it is.
